meta.title: Complete Data Analysis Masterclass - From Excel to Machine Learning
meta.description: The most comprehensive 6-month data analysis program. Master Excel, SQL, Python, statistics, visualization, and business intelligence. Transform raw data into actionable insights and become a professional data analyst.

program_overview.title: Complete Data Analysis Masterclass
program_overview.tagline: From Spreadsheet Basics to Advanced Analytics in 6 Months
program_overview.description:
This intensive 6-month program transforms complete beginners into professional data analysts capable of extracting insights from complex datasets, creating compelling visualizations, and driving data-driven decisions in any organization.

You'll master the complete analytics toolkit: Excel for quick analysis, SQL for database querying, Python for advanced analytics, statistics for rigorous analysis, and modern BI tools for interactive dashboards. Learn to clean messy data, perform exploratory analysis, build predictive models, and present findings that influence business strategy.
what_makes_this_different: Start from absolute basics - no prerequisites
Real business datasets and case studies
Covers both technical and business aspects

learning_path.phase_1: Foundation (Months 1-2): Excel Mastery, Statistics Basics, Data Fundamentals
learning_path.phase_2: Technical Skills (Months 3-4): SQL, Python, Data Cleaning, Analysis Techniques
learning_path.phase_3: Advanced Analytics (Months 5-6): Visualization, BI Tools, ML Basics, Business Intelligence

phase_1_foundation.title: PHASE 1: Foundation & Excel Mastery (Months 1-2, Weeks 1-8)
phase_1_foundation.description: Build strong foundations in data concepts, statistics, and become an Excel power user.

week_1_2.title: Introduction to Data Analysis
topics: What is data analysis? Role in modern business
Types of data: structured, unstructured, semi-structured
Introduction to datasets and data sources

week_3_4.title: Excel Fundamentals & Formulas
topics: Essential formulas: SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT, MIN, MAX
Logical functions: IF, AND, OR, NOT
Nested IF statements and IFS function
Text functions: CONCATENATE, LEFT, RIGHT, MID, TRIM

week_5_6.title: Excel Data Management
topics: Text to columns and data parsing

week_7_8.title: Excel Advanced Functions
topics: INDIRECT and OFFSET for dynamic references
Creating custom functions with VBA basics

month_3_4.title: Month 2: Statistics & Data Visualization in Excel

week_9_10.title: Statistics Fundamentals
topics: Types of data: nominal, ordinal, interval, ratio
Measures of central tendency: mean, median, mode
Measures of spread: range, variance, standard deviation
Type I and Type II errors

week_11_12.title: Excel Data Analysis Tools
topics: What-if analysis: Goal Seek, Scenario Manager

week_13_14.title: Data Visualization in Excel
topics: Chart types and when to use them
Data bars, color scales, icon sets

week_17.title: Phase 1 Assessment
projects: Analyze real company data, create insights, build dashboard, present findings
week_17.assessment: Phase 1 Exam - Excel and Statistics Mastery

month_5_6.title: Months 3-4: SQL & Python for Data Analysis

week_18_19.title: SQL Fundamentals
topics: SELECT statements and filtering with WHERE
Aggregate functions: COUNT, SUM, AVG, MIN, MAX
Date and time functions in SQL

week_22_23.title: SQL Analytics Functions
topics: LAG and LEAD for time comparisons

week_26.title: Phase 2 Assessment
projects: Build end-to-end analytics solution with SQL and Python
Include data extraction, transformation, and reporting
week_26.assessment: Phase 2 Exam - SQL and Python Proficiency

phase_2_frontend_mastery.title: PHASE 2: Advanced Python & Data Processing (Months 3-4, Weeks 9-17)
phase_2_frontend_mastery.description: Master Python for data analysis, pandas, data cleaning, and exploratory data analysis.

week_27_28.title: Pandas Fundamentals
topics: loc and iloc for data access

week_36_37.title: Matplotlib & Seaborn
topics: Line plots, scatter plots, bar charts
Distribution plots: histograms, KDE, box plots

week_40_41.title: Business Intelligence Tools
topics: Connecting to data sources in Tableau

week_52.title: Phase 3 Assessment
projects: Complete business problem solving with data collection, analysis, ML, visualization, and recommendations
week_52.assessment: Phase 3 Exam - Professional Data Analyst Assessment

phase_3_backend_engineering.title: PHASE 3: Industry Applications & Career Launch (Months 5-6, Weeks 18-26)
phase_3_backend_engineering.description: Master industry-specific analytics, cloud platforms, and prepare for professional roles.

phase_4_advanced_production.title: CONTINUOUS LEARNING: Post-Course Resources
phase_4_advanced_production.description: Lifetime learning paths and advanced certifications

week_104.title: Career Resources
week_104.assessment: LIFETIME SUPPORT - Continuous updates and community access

projects_throughout_course: Phase 1: Excel Dashboards, Statistical Analysis, Business Reports
Phase 2: SQL Analytics, Python Automation, Data Cleaning Pipelines
Phase 3: ML Models, Interactive Dashboards, Industry Solutions
Final: Complete Analytics Platform with Real Business Impact
additional_learning_resources.total_projects_built: 25+ professional projects across all tools and industries
skills_mastered: Tools: Excel (Advanced), SQL, Python, Tableau, Power BI, Google Analytics
Programming: Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit-learn)
Statistics: Descriptive, Inferential, Hypothesis Testing, Regression
Visualization: Charts, Dashboards, Interactive Reports, Storytelling
Machine Learning: Regression, Classification, Clustering, Time Series
Business: KPIs, Metrics, Reporting, Presentation, Communication
Databases: SQL, NoSQL basics, Data Warehousing, ETL
Cloud: AWS, GCP, Azure basics for analytics
Soft Skills: Problem-solving, Critical thinking, Communication

support_provided.career_support: Resume review, mock interviews, job referrals
